name: SmoothEstimate
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
SmoothEstimate, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: SmoothEstimate).

Estimates the smoothness of an image

    Examples
    --------

    >>> est = SmoothEstimate()
    >>> est.inputs.zstat_file = 'zstat1.nii.gz'
    >>> est.inputs.mask_file = 'mask.nii'
    >>> est.cmdline
    'smoothest --mask=mask.nii --zstat=zstat1.nii.gz'

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Dof
inputs.description: An integer. Number of degrees of freedom.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str' and with values which are a bytes or none or a value of class 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Mask file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Brain mask volume.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti' or 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti_pair_gz'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Residual fit file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Residual-fit image file.

inputs.name: Zstat file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Zstat image file.

output-files.name: Resels
output-files.description: A float. Volume of resel, in voxels, defined as fwhm_x * fwhm_y * fwhm_z.

output-files.name: Volume
output-files.description: An integer. Number of voxels in mask.
